author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kimberly-Clark - Approved $30 Mln For Expansion And Improvements To Its Nonwovens Manufacturing Facility
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Kimberly-Clark Corp:
* KIMBERLY-CLARK CORP - APPROVED $30 MILLION FOR EXPANSION AND IMPROVEMENTS TO ITS NONWOVENS MANUFACTURING FACILITY IN HENDERSONVILLE, NORTH CAROLINA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
